format:
<template>
    <v-text-field
        label="My variable"
        variant="outlined"
        v-model="msg.variable"
        @update:model-value="send({ variable: msg.variable})"
    ></v-text-field>
</template>

name: get global variable
set global variable
get global variable
set global variable
modify global variable
content:
### modify global variable

```html
<template>
    <v-text-field
        label="My variable"
        variant="outlined"
        v-model="msg.variable"
        @update:model-value="send({ variable: msg.variable})"
    ></v-text-field>
</template>

```

name: text
content:
### text input

Adds a single text input row to your dashboard, with a configurable "type" (text, password, etc).

### Available modes include:
### 
 - Text Input: Standard text input field
 - E-Mail Address: Offers validation on any input to ensure it's a valid e-mail address.
 - Password: Hides the input from the user to offer protected input.
 - Number: Adds an up/down selector to choose an integer.
 - Color Picker: Displays a single block color selector
 - Time Picker: HH:mm formatted time picker
 - Week Picker: A Calendar widget to select a given full week, returns YYYY-W<WW>>
 - Month Picker: A Calendar widget to select a given month, returns YYYY-MM
 - Datetime Picker: A Calendar widget to select full datetime value. Returns YYY-MM-DDTHH:mm
 - Dynamic Properties (Inputs)
Any of the following can be appended to a msg.ui_update in order to override or set properties on this node at runtime.

name: number
content:
### number input
Adds a single number input row to your dashboard

### Dynamic Properties (Inputs)
Any of the following can be appended to msg.ui_update in order to override or set properties on this node at runtime.

name: template persistent hint
format:
<template>
    <v-text-field
    type="number"
      label="Label"
      variant="outlined"
      suffix="suffix"
      density="compact"
      clearable
      persistent-hint
      hint="This is some additional information displayed in a hint."
    ></v-text-field>
</template>

name: Vuetify links
content:
# Vuetify Resources and Examples

This document provides useful links and references for working with Vuetify components, icons, and examples.

## Input Fields
- **Component Usage**: Learn how to use input fields in Vuetify.  
  [View Documentation](https://vuetifyjs.com/en/components/text-fields/#usage)

- **API Reference**: Explore the full API details for `v-field`.  
  [View API](https://vuetifyjs.com/en/api/v-field/)

## Icons
- **Material Design Icons**: Access the Material Design Icons (MDI) library for Vuetify projects.  
  [Explore Icons](https://pictogrammers.github.io/@mdi/font/2.0.46/)

## Code Playground
- **Vue Play**: Experiment with Vue.js and Vuetify components in an interactive playground.  
  [Open Playground](https://play.vuetifyjs.com/#)

---

Feel free to refer to these resources while working on your Vuetify projects!
